mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.

mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right Click on Map Device to Use

mmorpg.word.repairkit2: Craft with fuel mat to charge.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify first item in inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.socketlvlisnthigherthaniteml: Socket lvl not higher than gear lvl
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An Identify Scroll can reveal it.

mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Age of Exile [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
mmorpg.unique_gear.angel_prot_necklace.d: If your guardian is careful enough, you just might think they don't exist.
mmorpg.unique_gear.beast_blood.desc: Accept the blood, suffer the Sacrifice. Be reborn anew.
mmorpg.unique_gear.birth_miracle.desc: Life can sometimes keep on giving.
mmorpg.unique_gear.crown_of_elements.des: Have you ever felt true power?
mmorpg.unique_gear.divine_might.desc: God might prefer peaceful means, but sometimes peace is not an option.
mmorpg.unique_gear.exec_pride.desc: To miss is not an option.
mmorpg.unique_gear.eye_of_zegrath.desc: A cultist once so powerful, even his remnant eye inflicts ills on others.
mmorpg.unique_gear.fifth_rider.desc: The only thing that's missing is the horse.
mmorpg.unique_gear.frigid_staff.desc: Found in a deep pit of ice. Many wands were shattered in attempts to imbue it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.frost_crown.desc: Everyone needs a proper burial, and I will make theirs dazzling.
mmorpg.unique_gear.gluttony_helmet.desc: If only hunger could be sated, I would not be doomed.
mmorpg.unique_gear.greed_persist.desc: When desire for perfection overtakes your sanity, you too will be blessed.
mmorpg.unique_gear.harbinger.desc: His eyes like black holes, his armor had the color of horizon.
mmorpg.unique_gear.hunger_neck.desc: They say the only way to take off this necklace is to rid yourself of your mortal flesh.
mmorpg.unique_gear.inca_thunder.desc: The ability to wield thunder is said to come once in a millennium.
mmorpg.unique_gear.inner_conflux.desc: Merge the Rivers of Mana and Magic, attain infinity, or die.
mmorpg.unique_gear.jester_hat.desc: One, two, three, fail. Whoops! One, two..
mmorpg.unique_gear.kingmaker.desc: Alone we falter, together we rise.
mmorpg.unique_gear.loop_of_infinity.desc: Is it truly an end if everything just starts all over again? Maybe it really is just a loop.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ms_armor_chest.desc: If only they knew that the inscription referred to the armor.
mmorpg.unique_gear.obsi_might.desc: This thirst for blood only seems lower than it's desire to taste burning flesh.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rot_phys.desc: Strange things you find yourself liking. Like a stick, with a piece of rotten flesh on it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.skull_of_spirits.desc: The mysterious skull contains knowledge of the contained spirits, but also their madness.
mmorpg.unique_gear.snake_eye.desc: Eternally dead, and yet not blind.
mmorpg.unique_gear.solar_ring.desc: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the brightest of them all?
mmorpg.unique_gear.touch_of_eternity.des: Worn by Kings, Beggars, Barbarians, Queens, Prophets and now ... you.
mmorpg.unique_gear.will_of_flora.desc: Everything must be exactly as required.
mmorpg.unique_gear.worldbearer.desc: The ability to carry any burden is a heavy one.
item.mmorpg.currency.crystal_of_truth.de: Transform Common Item into random higher rarity.
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls explicit numbers on a gear
item.mmorpg.currency.orb_of_transmutatio: Transform Common Item into higher rarity
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to DEX, INT STR, VIT, WIL, AGI.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_ele_dmg: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases physical damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood: Blood is a unique resource that works like mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood_user: You use blood instead of mana
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Burning
mmorpg.stat_desc.burning_currents: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_burn: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_chill: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_poison: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_static: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chill_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Chilled
mmorpg.stat_desc.chilling_tides: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.convert_hp_to_phys_dmg: Converts % of health to your physical damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.convert_ms_to_hp: Converts % of magic shield to health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.crashing_rocks: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_shield: Decreases that amount of damage from every attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Determines your total: Critical Chance, Ranged Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_hunger: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_poison: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_wither: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dodge_to_ele_doddge: Adds % of dodge rating to elemental dodge. Elemental dodge is able to dodge elemental attacks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds x element damage on weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_pene: Ignores that much resists, it works as subtraction.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops X percent damage of that element
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: Increases elemental damage of x weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases Dmg for that element by a percent but decreases dmg from all other elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.extra_mob_drops: Mobs with this stat drop extra loot when slain.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fast_frostball: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.faster_cast_rate: Reduces amount of time needed to cast spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.frostball_chill: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_effect_on_self: Affects all heal effects applied to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_to_dmg: Adds % of your increased healing to your total spell damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_to_ms: Affects all heal effects applied to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_on_kill: Restore Health Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heart_of_chill: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heart_of_magic: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.hp_resto_to_blood: Refills your blood by a % of your non spell related health restoration effects.
mmorpg.stat_desc.hp_to_blood: Adds % of health to total blood pool.
mmorpg.stat_desc.hunger_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ice_flower_dmg: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ice_flower_restore: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing: Increases all types of healing recieved like health regen, lifesteal, life on hit, spell heals etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.increased_quantity: Increases amount of loot found in chests
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: All Elemental Damage, Magic Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.life_on_hit: Gives health on basic attack hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: Percent of basic attack DMG added to health
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_dmg: Modifies damage of that type. This includes spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items found in chests.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_on_hit: Gives magic shield on basic attack hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Works like extra health. But regen is separate.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_on_kill: Restore Magic Shield Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_steal: Percent of basic attack DMG will restore magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_burn_resist: Protects against mana burn by x percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_cost_red: Reduces Mana Cost of all spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_kill: Restore Mana Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_shield: Percent of damage is absorbed by mana. This effect only works if mana is not less than 50 percent capacity. Mana shield is applied after magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_steal: Percent of basic attack DMG added to mana
mmorpg.stat_desc.melee_dmg: Modifies damage of that type. This includes spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_imbue_crit: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mob_imbue_phys: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_fast_bush: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_holy_flower_cure: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_holy_flower_dmg: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_holy_flower_rest: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_imbue_ele: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_magma_flower_burn: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_magma_flower_heal: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_mana_cd: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_mana_ele_res: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_mana_magic: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_poison_bush: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_slow_bush: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_thorn_armor_thorns: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_throw_flames_burn: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_throw_flames_fast: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_throw_flames_lifest: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_tp_dmg: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_tp_ele_res: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_tp_fast: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.per_spell_restoration: Increases restoration effects of spell: healing, mana restore etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Poisoned
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ranged_dmg: Modifies damage of that type. This includes spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.slow_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG of all spells no matter the element
mmorpg.stat_desc.static_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Charged
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Determines your total: Critical Damage, Melee Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.total_damage: Increases all your damage. Attacks, spells etc.
mmorpg.stat_desc.turn_phys_to_ele: Turns % of phys atk dmg into ele
mmorpg.stat_desc.vitality: Determines your total: Health, Health Regeneration
mmorpg.stat_desc.weapon_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.willpower: Determines your total: Magic Shield, Magic Shield Regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.wisdom: Determines your total: Mana, Mana Regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.wither_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
